description.en: Random box that contains Cotton Candies and a chance to get a Flying Cloud.
description.ar: Random box that contains Cotton Candies and a chance to get a Flying Cloud.
description.br: Caixa aleatória que contém Algodões Doces e uma chance de conseguir uma Nuvem Voadora.
description.cns: 包含棉花糖的随机盒子，并有机会获得飞云。
description.de: Enthält süße Zuckerwatte, die deine Stats für eine Weile erhöht. Mit viel Glück erhältst du eine fliegende Wolke.
description.fi: Random box that contains Cotton Candies and a chance to get a Flying Cloud.
description.fil: Random box that contains Cotton Candies and a chance to get a Flying Cloud.
description.fr: Des barbes à papa sucrées qui améliorent vos statistiques temporairement sont à l'intérieur. Si vous êtes vraiment chanceux, vous pouvez y trouver un nuage volant !
description.id: Kotak acak yang berisi Cotton Candies dan kesempatan untuk mendapatkan Flying Cloud.
description.it: Random box that contains Cotton Candies and a chance to get a Flying Cloud.
description.jp: モクモクしたものが入っています。ほとんどがあま～いもので、たまに空が飛べちゃうモクモクが入っていることも…？
description.kr: 일시적으로 능력을 올려주는 달콤한 솜사탕이 들어있다. 가끔 비행체 구름이 들어있는 경우도 있다고 한다.
description.nl: Random box that contains Cotton Candies and a chance to get a Flying Cloud.
description.pl: Random box that contains Cotton Candies and a chance to get a Flying Cloud.
description.ru: Random box that contains Cotton Candies and a chance to get a Flying Cloud.
description.sp: Caja aleatoria que contiene Algodones de Azúcar y una posibilidad de conseguir una Nube Voladora.
description.sw: Random box that contains Cotton Candies and a chance to get a Flying Cloud.
description.th: กล่องสุ่มที่มี Cotton Candies และมีโอกาสได้รับ Flying Cloud
description.tw: 含有隨機棉花糖的箱子，有機會得到筋斗雲
description.vi: Hộp ngẫu nhiên có Kẹo bông và cơ hội nhận được Mây bay.
